EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Architecting for Continuous Delivery: Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Architecting for Continuous Delivery: Microservices with Pivotal CF and Spring Cloud. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, October 21, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, GMT+1) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=293386342> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 293 386 342 Thank you,
